item.title: Need help with a code thing
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

To add this, go into client.java and search noclip

You should see something like this else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("noclip") && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("admin")) { if (absY <= 3000) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " is a n00b who wants to cheat!"); showInterface(99999999); // Xerozcheez: Haha take that noob disconnected = true; } else { sendMessage("Trying to cheat noob"); sendMessage("Trying to cheat noob"); sendMessage("Trying to cheat noob"); sendMessage("Trying to cheat noob"); sendMessage("Trying to cheat noob"); sendMessage("Trying to cheat noob"); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " is a n00b who wants to cheat! :0"); MainHelpMenu(); }

Under the last }

Add yours.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with a code thing
item.dc:creator: @glennnn8 glennnn8
item.description:
@glennnn8 wrote:

Hi,
I got a code to warn pple butt in wich folder do i need to putt it ?Â¿?
its like this ::warn_Glennnn8

[code]if(command.startsWith(âwarnâ) && (playerRights >= 2)) {
String name = command.substring(5);
client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)];
c.sendQuest("@dre@!!!Warning!!!", 8144); //Title
c.clearQuestInterface();
c.sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@You have been warned by â+playerName+â@dre@", 8145);
c.sendQuest("@dbl@Plz Read the following", 8147);
c.sendQuest("@dbl@", 8148);
c.sendQuest("@dre@"+playerName+" has warned and now has full rights", 8149);
c.sendQuest("@dbl@to ban you. If you think â+playerName+â who", 8150);
c.sendQuest("@dbl@just warned you may ban you unfairly.", 8151);
c.sendQuest("@dbl@Then go to â, 8152);
c.sendQuest(â@dbl@", 8153);
c.sendQuest("@dbl@But, if you are warned fairly.", 8154);
c.sendQuest("@dbl@Plz Plz Plz try to behave", 8155);
c.sendQuest("@dbl@Thanks, @dre@@dre@", 8156);
c.sendQuestSomething(8143);
c.showInterface(8134);
flushOutStream();
BufferedWriter bw = null;

  try {
     bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("logs/warned.txt", true));
bw.write(playerName+" warned "+name);
bw.newLine();
bw.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
if (bw != null) try {
    bw.close();
} catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage("Error logging warning!");
}
  }

}[/code]

iam using the sourch Evilscape.
Already thanks for any help!

Glenn
